moves.name: Body Slam
moves.effect: Has a chance (30%) of leaving the target paralyzed.

moves.name: X Speed
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Stomp
moves.effect: Has a chance (30%) of making the target flinch.

moves.name: I’m All Kinds of Strong!
moves.effect: Restores the user’s HP by approximately 40% of its maximum HP. Raises the user’s Defense by 2 stat ranks.

syncMove.name: Supercute Rolling Tackle
syncMove.description: This move’s power increases when the target is paralyzed.

passives.name: Mad Strength 2
passives.description: Has a chance (30%) of raising the user’s Attack by one stat rank when one of its attack moves is successful.
